Dialog: Outers must save themselves instead of relying on the inner government.
Yeah! Let's start a revolution! If we don't do something about it, no one will. Outers must save themselves instead of relying on the inner government. We must show the Inner what we got.

The protest against the Inner government was bigger than you thought, and It went out of control. During the riot, the protester destroyed spaceships and factories. Police use violence to control the situation, and a lot of people got injured.
The inner government published an editorial to define the protestors as a terrorist organization.
